lines.text: Those who forget the lessons of the past are doomed to repeat them.
Look, I'm sure you and your little bulldog didn't just fly in to see the cows.
That's what I like about you, Jonathan, always direct. No fat, no lean.
Quite unnecessary of course, my people adore me.
Well, you obviously have all the facts at your disposal, what do you want from me?
Kidnapping is no longer a crime, it's a business.
You're like a fine wine, Jonathan, better with every taste.
You always did have smooth lines, Terry.
Join me, Cross. The far East would become your empire.
I never believed this would happen.
That's the trouble with you, Jonathan. You believe too much.
